bug.author: vmichals
bug.description:
Describe the bug I specified a working-dir to orion hunt and it creates subfolders for the trials, each with two files results_*.log and trial_*.conf. After a trial is completed the corresponding results file contains the result, but the configuration file remains empty. Expected behavior The configuration file should contain the trial's hyperparameter configuration. Steps to reproduce Call orion hunt with the --working-dir argument. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Python version: e.g. 3.6.9 Or√≠on version: develop Database: PickleDB

comments.comment: Thanks for opening this issue üëç. We'll fix this ASAP.
Hi Vincent, I'm trying to reproduce this issue without success so far. Could you please share your script configuration?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vmichals>@vmichals</denchmark-link> , do you still have the issue with latest develop version? I would close this issue otherwise. Thanks!
I will close the issue since there is no update. Feel free to open it back if you still have the issue.
